title: Ewan McGregor proudly smiles at his daughter Jamyan, 18, at the Doctor Sleep premiere
text:
He is a father to four daughter from his relationship with ex wife Eve Mavrakis.

And Ewan McGregor proved to be every inch the doting dad as he attended the Doctor Sleep premiere with his daughter Jamyan, 18, on Tuesday evening.

The actor, 48, who plays the role of Danny Torrance in The Shining sequel, looked on proudly as he posed for snaps with Jamyan on the red carpet at the screening.

Beaming: Ewan McGregor proved to be every inch the doting dad as he attended the Doctor Sleep premiere with his daughter Jamyan, 18, on Tuesday evening

Ewan donned a grey doubled breasted jacket with gold buttons, teamed with a pair of matching suit trousers and a pair of maroon brogues.

The Obi-Wan Kenobi actor showcased his rugged good looks as he swept his dark blonde tresses off his face and sported a well-groomed beard.

Ewan sweetly held hands with his daughter, who looked stylish in a long black cardigan, which she wore with a pretty floral skirt and black strappy heels.

Ewan and Eve also became parents to Clara, 23, Ester, 17, and Anouk, eight, during their 22-year marriage, before splitting in 2017 when he developed a relationship with his Fargo co-star Mary Elizabeth Winstead, 34.

Cute: The actor, 48, who plays the role of Danny Torrance in The Shining sequel, looked on proudly as he posed for snaps with Jamyan on the red carpet at the screening

As their relationship became widely known Clara hit out at her father in January, during a sun-soaked trip with her mother and sister Esther, as she posted a beach snap of Eve looking sensational in a two-piece.

She captioned the image: 'My mother, ladies & gentlemen,' she wrote, adding pointedly: '50 is the new 30 apparently.'

However she became more hostile when a follower commented saying: 'Good to know you have the genes . . . keep her away from your boyfriends.'

Dapper: Ewan donned a grey doubled breasted jacket with gold buttons, teamed with a pair of matching suit trousers and a pair of maroon brogues

Clara replied: 'I keep her away from a*****e men who leave my goddess of a mother,' followed by a smiling face emoji.'

However months on Ewan and Clara appear to have mended their strained relationship judging by recent snaps of them filming The Birthday Cake together.

In Doctor Sleep, Ewan's character Danny meets a young girl, Abra Stone [Kyleigh Curran] with 'shining' powers and tries to help her.

While still battling to overcome the trauma of the events that occurred at the Overlook Hotel during his childhood, he forms an alliance with Abra to battle the True Knot, a cult whose members try to feed off the shine of innocents like Abra.
